name: Bubble Popping by Galatic Droids
description:
Bubble Popping - Simple addictive fun.

There are 2 ways to play bubble popping :-

1. Just relax, chill out, de-stress, pop some bubbles and watch the other bubbles drift around the screen.


2. For the more competitive out there - try and score as many points as possible by bumping bubbles of the same colour into each other.

For example if two yellow bubbles bump then you get a point. The faster they bump together the more points you score. Any score over 100 is good, but scores much higher are possible with careful planning and fast small bubbles.

Either way we hope you have hours of fun Popping Bubbles.
